QuestData.Title: Don't Go into the Light
QuestData.Description:
Okay, dis is de moment of truth! We will see if my voodoo can cure Zaluto.
I should have been honest with you... dere is a chance dis won't work. Voodoo isn't a science, you know.
I need you to hold Zaluto down, because dis here is going to hurt. A lot.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hold Zaluto down while Jin'Tiki cures him.
